title: Ravishing Diamond Bangle Set - Kangan
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features a classic Hyderabadi polish.
features: This exquisite bangle set features a contemporary design with individual settings for each diamond. The diamonds are set in a shared prong setting, maximizing their brilliance. The smooth, rounded edges ensure comfortable wear. The design is perfect for blending traditional wear with modern aesthetics.
colors: Golden yellow and dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: and celebratory events. Also suitable for everyday wear due to its comfortable design and refined look.
description: This bangle set is a timeless piece showcasing the brilliance of diamonds and the richness of gold. Its contemporary design makes it versatile, and the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. It symbolizes prosperity and elegance, making it a precious addition to any jewelry collection.
